name: airbnb
description: Provides tools to search Airbnb and get listing details.

examples.title: Search for Airbnb Listings
examples.description: Search for listings in a specified location.
examples.prompt: Search for listings in New York

examples.title: Get Listing Details
examples.description: Retrieve details for a specific listing.

location.description: The location where you want to search for Airbnb listings

placeId.description: The unique identifier for a specific place or location

checkin.description: The check-in date for your stay in YYYY-MM-DD format

checkout.description: The check-out date for your stay in YYYY-MM-DD format

pets.description: The number of pets allowed in the listing

minPrice.description: The minimum price per night for the listings

maxPrice.description: The maximum price per night for the listings

cursor.description: A cursor for paginating through results

ignoreRobotsText.description: Set to true to disregard Airbnb's robots.txt rules for all requests
